Name: Grederys
About the game: History The plot of the game revolves around the protagonist Kleit Kremer, who returns in a taxi, approaching a terrible car accident. Waking up centuries later, strange and frightening events begin with Kleit, he does not understand what is happening, but he is trying to survive and understand what is happening around him, where is everyone who is chasing him and how to get out of here? After a while, Kleit begins to guess that he is alone in the subconscious with his fears. How they wake up and return to the world familiar to him, he does not know. Can Klein wake up? Test mode Test your strength by completing other survival story missions, coming face to face with monsters that will not even give you a chance to survive.
